title: Not linking with the framework OpenGLES (referenced by a module reference in SkiaSharp.Views.iOS.dll)
body:
I am building SkiaSharp in a .Net Maui project on Mac but am receiving this error

ILLINK : warning MT0182: Not linking with the framework OpenGLES (referenced by a module reference in SkiaSharp.Views.iOS.dll) because it's not available on the current platform (MacCatalyst).

I have tried adding SkiaSharp.View.Maui.Controls to the main project but it did not help.

I also created a new, blank Maui project and added a SKCanvasView to the main page, it did not give me an error like my main project, but it did give me a warning with the same message.
